law.catch_line: For each retail sale or sale for use other than a sale under § 11-405, § 11-406, or § 11-410 of t...
law.text:
For each retail sale or sale for use other than a sale under § 11-405, § 11-406, or § 11-410 of this title, the sales and use tax shall be:
stated separately from the sale price; and
shown separately from the sale price on any record of a sale:
at the time of the sale;
when the vendor issues evidence of the sale; or
when the vendor uses evidence of the sale.
